entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as standing underneath a sign in the shop, examining a tray of blood-flavored lollipops. He is also mentioned as being impressed by Harry's ability to Apparate.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as standing underneath a sign in the shop, examining a tray of blood-flavored lollipops. She is also mentioned as being surprised by Harry's sudden appearance.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as sneaking up behind Ron and Hermione, and later as revealing his ability to Apparate.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the Marauder's Map creators who did not give it to Harry.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the Marauder's Map creators who did not give it to Harry.

relationships.description: Ron was surprised by Harry's sudden appearance.
Hermione was also surprised by Harry's sudden appearance.
Ron showed interest in the Marauder's Map, which he did not receive from his brothers Fred and George.
